name: mise-en-place
description: A polyglot version manager for Node.js, Python, Go, and hundreds of other tools. Manages language runtimes and development tools with unified configuration.

defaultTools.description: Comma-separated list of tools to pre-install during feature installation (e.g., 'node@lts,python@3.11,go@latest')

shimPath.description: Path where mise shims will be configured (for PATH precedence)
